channel.title: U'Marine Meteoroid
channel.description: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.

item.title: When I whisk away dusts in my childhood...
item.description:
Since RSS readers do not display the blog content perfectly, please read this article in your browser.

Info

This photo was taken in Shiboyuan, Shenyang, China in 2011. The shooting time is 14:15 on May 1, UTC+8. I photoshopped it and made A PPT report.
